select oe.id, oe.order_id, oe.score, oe.user_id, oe.remark, oe.images, oe.create_date, oi.code as orderCode, oi.total, oi.order_name, ui.name as userName, vi.vehicle_number, vi.name as vehicleName, vi.images from order_evaluate oe left join order_info oi on (oi.id = oe.order_id) left join user_info ui on (ui.id = oi.user_id) left join vehicle_info vi on (vi.vehicle_no = oi.vehicle_no) where 1 = 1
AND oi.order_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{orderEvaluate.orderName},'%')
AND ui.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{orderEvaluate.userName},'%')
AND vi.vehicle_number LIKE CONCAT('%',#{orderEvaluate.vehicleNumber},'%')
AND vi.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{orderEvaluate.vehicleName},'%')
AND ui.id = #{orderEvaluate.userId}
order by oe.create_date desc
